name: Bomb-Out
description:
I made this game totally from scratch for the Blackthornprod 2021 GameJam.

Keeping in mind the jam's theme of "less is more" I limited the whole game to just one stage in an arcade fasion, I limited the entire colour palette to just 5 colors and the music to 5 chiptune instruments.

Gameplay wise, the objective is to push the bombs off the stage or stay alive as long as possible. The bombs will destroy the ground and 2 other bombs will appear. The less ground you have left, the more points you get, the faster you move.

Credits:

Pixel art, music, sound effects and coding by SxAde.

Publishing update (20-Jan-2021):

The WebGL version works just fine but I wanted to also include the stand-alone version for Windows after the submission just in case.
